Name: Sergeant Whiskers
Description: Born within the pixelated depths of a retro gaming console, Sergeant Whiskers has been on many digital battlefields. His buttons, once used to command virtual troops, now guide him through the adventures of the WebtrES club. His sturdy rocket limbs, remnants of a space-themed shoot-'em-up, propel him through the netways, leaving a trail of pixels in his wake. With a cat screen that displays an array of expressions, this feline-faced warrior has a strategic mind and a heart of gold. Sergeant Whiskers may look tough on the outside, but he’s got a soft spot for a good yarn and a cozy lap to rest on between his digital escapades.
